explanation: [0-0] The screen shows a blue background.

[0-7] First, the camera moves to the left and zooms in. On a wooden platform, there is a black cube with red decorations and glowing elements. On top of it lies a book that keeps flipping its pages. To the left of the black cube is another wooden platform, where a yellow figure appears from the left side. He is holding a pile of brown objects. The yellow figure throws the brown objects into the air, catches them with his hands and feet, then picks up two of them and puts them on his feet.

[14-24] The scene switches back to the yellow figure, who places the two brown objects onto the constantly flipping book. An enchantment interface appears above. The yellow figure takes out a blue item, and the first row on the right side of the enchantment interface lights up. He reaches out his right hand and taps it, turning the first row on the right side of the interface purple before it disappears. Two purple items appear in the air. The yellow figure catches one with his right hand, then jumps and uses his left hand to catch the other. Holding the other purple item, he presses it onto the surface of the water, turning that area into ice. English subtitles appear above, reading "Leather Boots Frost Walker I", then disappear.
